Requirements¶

The LinkedIn Data Gather (LIDG) script requires a few things to be installed on your system, specifically:

  1. MongoDB
  2. pyMongo
  3. bson
  4. BeautifulSoup4

Standard library features that LIDG uses are:

  1. sys
  2. comparison urllib2
  3. comparison time
